title: FINALLY
body:
After thousands of reports over the majority of games I have played, finally, someone actually got penalized. Thank you Riot, this means so much for me, that's 1 less toxic person in the community.

http://imgur.com/P8nrEYW

replies.body:
That's funny that you are getting people punished Fitzky. Because sometimes people have stressful days and get mad. Who does that bring to mind..... oh that's right...

You. I met you a few days ago in a game, and if you can't recall, you were incredibly toxic towards me and my friend. I didn't report you, because I knew that some people have more depth to them than the game that you meet them. Now, to be fair, you aren't been hypocritical because this player was clearly a continuous offender, but I just want you to remember for the future, that no matter how much preaching you do on the boards, you are never guaranteed to not end up as the person you despise so very much.

And yes, this comment is written out of JEALOUSY that you SOMEHOW GOT SOMEONE PUNISHED with this BROKEN report system.
Which game was this please inform me

Your reports are helping to contribute to the detection of toxic players every time you report, even if it doesn't seem like it. You only get this notification if you reported the player and it was your report (or someone in that specific game's report) that triggered the punishment. 

Riot are currently looking into more ways of notifying players of this (because it is one of the best feelings in league TBH), which would be super cool. (No promises though)

Check what Lyte has to say on the topic [HERE](http://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answers/134527663810) and [HERE](http://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answers/134527205570).

Keep up the accurate reporting ♥
Snitches get stitches, hope you get shiv'd in the shower
